description: The file `main.dart` is a Flutter application entry point that sets up the home screen of a cinematic TV interface. It defines the main widget, loads data (including from assets or a data source), and assembles UI components like hero banners, navigation, and recommendation carousels. It also manages focus navigation and background animations.

classes.name: HomeData
classes.description: Data model for home page JSON data, including title, tags, synopsis, hero poster URL, and recommendations.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the home screen UI, including focus management, background animations, and composition of hero banner and recommendation row.

classes.name: DirectionalFocusIntent
classes.description: An intent used to handle directional focus movement in the UI.

classes.name: _VignettePainter
classes.description: CustomPainter that draws a vignette effect over the background.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point; initializes and runs the TV app.

methods.name: _HomeScreenState._loadHome
methods.description: Asynchronously loads home data either from a local JSON asset or from a data source in the app state.

methods.name: _HomeScreenState._handleDirectionalFocus
methods.description: Handles focus movement based on D-pad navigation signals.
